summary: The diff implements both requirements (REQ-14 and REQ-15) with a backend referral link entry containing the exact Amazon affiliate URL, appropriate title/description for a hair care product, and frontend logic to display the corresponding thumbnail image. The implementation includes a migration script, backend tracking functionality, and frontend image path mapping.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) implementing a migration pattern with OldActor/NewActor types
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not specify creating a migration system or migration module. It only requests adding a referral link entry to the backend.
